name: X-Pipes Evolution
summary:
X-Pipes Evolution is a revamped version of the old Factor Software's classic MacPipes.

It keeps the same familiar gameplay of it successful predecessor while adding eye-poppin' cartoonish graphics, mind relaxing music and high quality sound effects.
In this game you play the role of a tiny robot plumber called Roderick in a quest to solve plumbing problems scattered over several different worlds.
Your goal is to hook up pipe parts on a grid to create a pipeline of required length before the fluid reaches the last connected pipe.
Can you help Roderick save his universe from flooding?
